Class: Epoch.Chart.Canvas

Defined in: coffee/epoch.coffee
Inherits: Epoch.Chart.Base

Overview

Base Class for all Canvas based charts.

Direct Known Subclasses

Epoch.Time.Gauge Epoch.Time.Plot

Instance Method Summary

  • # (Number) getWidth()
  • # (Number) getHeight()
  • # (void) clear() Clears the render canvas.
  • # (Object) getStyles(selector)

Inherited Method Summary

Methods inherited from Epoch.Chart.Base

#setData #update #draw #extent #on #off #trigger

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(options = {})

Initializes the chart and places the rendering canvas in the specified HTML container element.

Parameters:

  • options ( Object ) — Options for the SVG chart.

Options Hash: (options):

  • el ( HTMLElement ) — Container element for the chart.
  • data ( Array ) — Layered data used to render the chart.

Instance Method Details

# (Number) getWidth()

Returns:

  • ( Number ) — width of the canvas with respect to the pixel ratio of the display

# (Number) getHeight()

Returns:

  • ( Number ) — height of the canvas with respect to the pixel ratio of the display

# (void) clear()

Clears the render canvas.

# (Object) getStyles(selector)

Parameters:

  • selector ( String ) — The selector used to compute the styles.

Returns:

  • ( Object ) — computed styles for the given selector in the context of this chart.
